reviews.review_msg: John is a great prof, and though I am not a big fan of political science readings, the readings in this class were actually pretty interesting and helpful.  He is a fair marker and is very helpful and genuinely cares about students.
Highly knowledgable. Readings are good overall, though there are A LOT of'em. Disregard the aforementioned negative feedback. Smart people will like this class. Very reasonable marker.Recommended.
